1.title: Introduction
1.plot: Theosophy is a mystical and occultist philosophy seeking direct knowledge of the mysteries of life and nature. Particularly of the nature of divinity and the origin and purpose of the universe. Join me as I unveil one of the most mysterious teachings of our day in the quest for enlightenment, tranquility and permanent happiness without any drugs or pills, only with the power our minds.
